name: Fool's Paradise (itch) (samovar22)
description:
"This game is too hard" - You

Disaster has struck the Oogla kingdom where Princess Tiana, the rightful ruler, has been overthrown by the dastardly King Bark, a tyrannical leader set on destroying the land's vibrant personality and using it to achieve global domination. You are Six, a well known and loved thief causing mischief for the unjust king and his band of evil watchers. Will you be able to steal the crown back from the ruthless king, and earn a royal kiss from the beautiful princess?

If the game is too easy you can press H to enable hard mode.

Menu theme by RaptorFace

Background music by Julius D. Johnson
